spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The merrow is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). The merrow has the following druid spells prepared:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The merrow can breathe air and water.

action.name: Harpoon
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the merrow can pull it 10 feet closer.

action.name: Lightning Bolt (3rd-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)
entries: The merrow unleashes a stroke of lightning in a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
